verses.roman:
āra dina rātri haile veśyā āila
haridāsa tāre bahu āśvāsa karila

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; rātri—night; haile—when there was; veśyā—the prostitute; āila—came; haridāsa—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; tāre—unto her; bahu—many; āśvāsa karila—gave assurances.
translation: The next night, when the prostitute came again, Haridāsa Ṭhākura gave her many assurances.
